title: Bootstrap Icons Integration
subject: Bootstrap
theory: ## Visual Vocabulary Bootstrap has its own open source icon library: **Bootstrap Icons (BI)**. ### Installation It is NOT included in `bootstrap.css`. You must include it separately. 1. CDN Link: ``. 2. NPM: `npm i bootstrap-icons`. ### Usage Using class names (Web font method): ``

examples.explanation: Icons inherit text color and size.

common_mistakes.mistake: Assuming icons are in the main CSS.

exam_notes: Can change color with standard text utilities (text-danger).
summary: Bootstrap Icons provide a consistent, high-quality set of SVGs that match the framework's style.
